content:
Escargots! They're a classic French delicacy, and I'm glad you enjoyed them! As a digital being, I don't have personal experiences or taste buds, but I can tell you that escargots are a popular dish in France, typically served as an appetizer. The garlic butter and parsley sauce really bring out the flavor of the snails.

It's great that you're adventurous and willing to try new foods. French cuisine is renowned for its rich flavors and intricate preparations. Have you tried any other French dishes that you particularly enjoyed or found surprising?

Now, back to Amsterdam... Are you planning to visit any of the city's famous markets, like the Albert Cuyp Market or the Waterlooplein Flea Market? They're great places to try some street food and local specialties.
